Package se.lib

Class Library

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.lib.Library

  • public class Library
extends java.lang.Object
    Library API main class. Can be instantiated with an default constructor without additional parameters.

      • addUser

        public void addUser​(java.lang.String username)
        provides registration of new users in the API.
        Parameters:

      • newRequest

        public void newRequest​(java.lang.String title,
                       java.lang.String author,
                       java.lang.String isbn)
        issues new book buy-request by users.
        Parameters:
        title - unique title of the requested book.
        author - of the requested book.
        isbn - unique ISBN nummer of the requested book.

      • bookBorrow

        public void bookBorrow​(java.lang.String username,
                       java.lang.String title)
                throws BookAlreadyBorrowedException,
                       BookNotFoundException,
                       TooManyBorrowsException,
                       UserNotFoundException
        provides borrowing books by users.
        Parameters:
        username - of the borrower.
        title - of the book the borrower would like to borrow.
        Throws:
        BookAlreadyBorrowedException - if the book is already borrowed by other user.
        BookNotFoundException - if there is no book of a given title in Library.
        TooManyBorrowsException - if the user has already reached borrows limit.
        UserNotFoundException - if there is no user of a given name in Library.

      • bookReturn

        public void bookReturn​(java.lang.String title)
                throws BookNotFoundException
        provides returning books by users.
        Parameters:
        title - of the book being returned.
        Throws:
        BookNotFoundException - if there is no book of a given title in Library.

      • getBooks

        public java.lang.String getBooks​()
        lists all books bought by the library.
        Returns:
        contains books available to borrow or currently borrowed by library's users.

      • getBookCurrentUser

        public java.lang.String getBookCurrentUser​(java.lang.String title)
                                    throws BookNotFoundException,
                                           UserNotFoundException
        checks who is a current borrower of a given book.
        Parameters:
        title - of the book being borrowed.
        Returns:
        name of a user.
        Throws:
        BookNotFoundException - if there is no book of a given title in Library.
        UserNotFoundException - if no user is currently borrowing the book.

      • getBookBorrowsCounter

        public int getBookBorrowsCounter​(java.lang.String title)
                          throws BookNotFoundException
        checks how many times a book was borrowed.
        Parameters:
        title - of the book being checked.
        Returns:
        borrows number.
        Throws:
        BookNotFoundException - if there is no book of a given title in Library.

      • getBookRequestsCounter

        public int getBookRequestsCounter​(java.lang.String title)
                           throws RequestNotFoundException
        checks how many times a book was borrowed.
        Parameters:
        title - of the requested book being checked.
        Returns:
        requests number.
        Throws:
        RequestNotFoundException - if there is no request of a given title in Library.
